hero.title: Building Connections That Create Real Impact
hero.description: ClearPaths Marketing is a face-to-face outreach and field marketing company connecting communities with meaningful charitable and humanitarian initiatives across the Greater Toronto Area.

intro.title: What We Do
intro.description: At ClearPaths Marketing, we specialize in direct community engagement. Our teams work face-to-face with the public to raise awareness, build trust, and generate long-term support for important causes. We believe genuine human interaction creates stronger connections than digital outreach alone.

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: ClearPaths Marketing is a community outreach and direct engagement company focused on helping organizations connect with people through meaningful, face-to-face conversations. Our teams represent charitable and humanitarian initiatives by engaging directly with communities, educating the public, and building long-term supporter relationships.
about.missionText: Our mission is to create positive community impact while developing individuals into confident professionals through hands-on experience, mentorship, and continuous learning.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: Honest and respectful communication in every interaction.

values.title: Impact
values.description: Supporting initiatives that create meaningful change.

values.title: Teamwork
values.description: Success achieved through collaboration and support.

about.cultureText: We foster a high-energy, supportive environment where individuals are encouraged to grow at their own pace. Daily coaching, team collaboration, and leadership development are core parts of our culture.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We specialize in direct community engagement and face-to-face outreach.

items.title: Face-to-Face Outreach Campaigns
items.description: Our representatives engage directly with communities through residential and public outreach campaigns, creating authentic conversations that build trust and awareness.

items.title: Community Engagement
items.description: We help organizations strengthen their presence by connecting directly with local communities through meaningful interactions and education-focused outreach.

items.title: Donor & Supporter Acquisition
items.description: Through professional communication and relationship-building, our teams help organizations expand their supporter base and increase long-term engagement.

items.title: Brand Awareness Initiatives
items.description: We represent partner organizations in public environments, helping communicate their mission clearly and effectively to new audiences.

items.title: Event & Field Marketing
items.description: Our teams participate in community events and outreach activities designed to increase visibility and public engagement.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear what our clients have to say about working with Clearpaths

items.quote: Clearpaths transformed our marketing strategy completely. Their face-to-face approach helped us connect with our donor base in ways we never thought possible.
Working with Clearpaths was seamless from start to finish. They quickly understood our needs and delivered a solution that exceeded expectations.
The team at Clearpaths brought such energy and expertise to our event. Their campaigns resulted in a 40% increase in brand awareness.
Clearpaths doesn't just deliver campaigns, they deliver results. Their understanding of the humanitarian sector is unmatched.
Professional, creative, and results-driven. Clearpaths is the best agency we've worked with in the non-profit space.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: ClearPaths Marketing is currently seeking motivated individuals to join our outreach and engagement team. This is a full-time, in-person opportunity combining office training with field outreach activities.
careers.dayInRole: Team members begin their day with training sessions, team meetings, and preparation before participating in community outreach campaigns where they engage directly with members of the public.
responsibilities: Engage in face-to-face conversations with the public
Deliver clear and confident campaign presentations
Participate in daily training and coaching sessions
Work toward individual and team performance goals
careers.schedule: Monday to Friday, 12:30 PM – 8:30 PM | Combination of office and field work
careers.compensation: Daily base support when working, plus performance-based commissions. Earnings grow as you gain experience with ClearPaths Marketing.

salaryBands.label: New Representatives
salaryBands.description: Typical range while you are learning the role and building your first campaigns.

salaryBands.label: Developing Representatives
salaryBands.description: For team members who are consistently hitting targets and growing their skills.

salaryBands.label: Experienced Performers
salaryBands.description: Top performers who lead by example and drive strong campaign results.

careers.growth: We believe in promoting from within. Team members who demonstrate consistency and leadership potential can progress into training and leadership responsibilities over time.
careers.applySection: Submit your application through our online form. Shortlisted candidates will be contacted by our recruitment team to schedule an interview.

community.title: Creating Meaningful Impact
community.engagement: At ClearPaths Marketing, our work goes beyond marketing — it’s about connecting people with causes that matter. Through face-to-face outreach, our teams help raise awareness and support for humanitarian and nonprofit initiatives that focus on improving lives and strengthening communities. Every conversation contributes to greater awareness and involvement within local communities.
community.commitment: We are committed to ethical outreach practices, respectful communication, and representing our partner organizations with professionalism and integrity.

cta.title: Ready to start your career with ClearPaths Marketing?
cta.description: Apply today and a member of our recruitment team will contact shortlisted candidates.

locations.name: Ontario
locations.address: 110 Matheson Blvd West, Mississauga, ON L5R 4G7

items.question: Do I need previous experience?
items.answer: No. Full training and ongoing mentorship are provided.

items.question: Is this a door-to-door role?
items.answer: The position involves face-to-face outreach and community engagement campaigns conducted in residential and public environments.

items.question: Is a vehicle required?
items.answer: No vehicle or driver’s license is required.

items.question: Are there any fees to join?
items.answer: No. Training, materials, and onboarding are provided at no cost.

items.question: What are the working hours?
items.answer: Monday to Friday, typically from 12:30 PM to 8:30 PM.

items.question: How does compensation work?
items.answer: Compensation includes daily base support along with performance-based commissions.
